room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Room Fayetteville in Fayetteville
review: Just left here on a spur of the moment date with my husband. We did the Pirate treasure room and escaped!! We literally called 5 minutes before arriving and they got us in in no time. Chris was amazing at helping us out with the hints! Will definitely be back asap

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Room Fayetteville in Fayetteville
review: Had an awesome time... Chris was great and really nice! The rooms are creative and I appreciated the variety of rooms they had to offer. We did the Rest In Pieces and Pirate room. Both were excellent!
